Sexual assaults over the last 12 months are <h8>`r ifelse(sexassaults_city$inc_prior3yearavgtolast12>=0," up"," down")` `r ifelse(sexassaults_city$inc_prior3yearavgtolast12>=0,sexassaults_city$inc_prior3yearavgtolast12,substring(sexassaults_city$inc_prior3yearavgtolast12,2))`%</h8> compared to the annual average over the last three years, according to the Los Angeles Police Department and Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department data through `r format(asofdate, "%B %d")`.

The areas of the county policed by the LAPD and Sheriff's Department averaged <h8>`r round(sexassaults_city$last12mos/52,0)`</h8> sexual assaults a week over the last 12 months. In 2019, that number was <h8>`r round(sexassaults_city$total19/52,0)`</h8> a week.

<subhead>A closer look at Los Angeles sexual assaults neighborhood by neighborhood</subhead>

The danger is not the same neighborhood to neighborhood. ABC7's data team looked at data from the Los Angeles Police Department and Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department by neighborhood from 2019 through `r format(asofdate, "%B %d, %Y")`, the latest date for which records are available from the two agencies.

The map color codes each police district by the sexual assault rate over the last 12 months. The three darker blue areas are neighborhoods with sexual assault rates higher than the citywide rate. You can also choose to see neighborhoods by the number of reported sexual assaults.

Click on any area neighborhood on the map to see detailed numbers, rates and trends.

You can find your neighborhood by using the box at the top of the map to search for any street, place, landmark or zip code to zoom to that location.

<br>

```{r cars, echo=FALSE,out.width='100%',out.height='600'}
# sexassault MAP

# Set bins for numbers of crimes for sexassaults map
sexassaultbins1 <- c(0,
                20,
                35,
                50,
                60,
                70)
sexassaultbins2 <- c(0,
                10,
                20,
                25,
                30,
                50)
sexassaultpal1 <- colorBin(c("#99a0a5",
                             "#2787d6",
                             "#0058f6",
                             "#003ca6",
                             "#00215c"), sexassaults_district$rate_last12, bins = sexassaultbins1,na.color = "#51585f")

sexassaultpal2 <- colorBin(c("#99a0a5",
                             "#2787d6",
                             "#0058f6",
                             "#003ca6",
                             "#00215c"), sexassaults_district$last12mos, bins = sexassaultbins2,na.color = "#51585f")

# Create quick labels for sexassaults map
sexassaultlabel <- paste(sep="",
                     "<popuptitle>",
                     sexassaults_district$last12mos,
                     " sexual assaults</popuptitle><br>",
                     " in the last 12 months in Police District <b>",
                     sexassaults_district$district,
                     "</b>, which includes the <b>",
                     sexassaults_district$placename,
                     "</b>areas, home to an estimated ",
                     prettyNum(sexassaults_district$population, big.mark=","),
                     " people.

# Creating police beats map for types of crimes
losangeles_sexassault_map <- leaflet(sexassaults_district, options = leafletOptions(zoomControl = FALSE, zoomSnap = 0.5, zoomDelta=0.5)) %>%
  htmlwidgets::onRender("function(el, x) {
L.control.zoom({ position: 'topright' }).addTo(this)
}") %>%
  setView(-118.24, 34.05, zoom = 10) %>% 
  addProviderTiles(provider = "CartoDB.Positron") %>%
  addPolygons(color = "white", 
              popup = sexassaultlabel,
              popupOptions = popupOptions(maxWidth ="200", 
                                          minWidth ="200"),
              weight = 2, 
              smoothFactor = 0.5,
              opacity = 0.6, 
              fillOpacity = 0.6,
              fillColor = ~sexassaultpal1(rate_last12),
              group="Rate") %>% 
    addPolygons(color = "white", 
              popup = sexassaultlabel,
              popupOptions = popupOptions(maxWidth ="200", 
                                          minWidth ="200"),
              weight = 2, 
              smoothFactor = 0.5,
              opacity = 0.6, 
              fillOpacity = 0.6,
              fillColor = ~sexassaultpal2(last12mos),
              group="Number") %>% 
    addSearchOSM(options = searchOptions(autoCollapse=FALSE, minLength = 3,zoom=13, position="topleft")) %>%
    onRender("function(el, x) {
        $('input.search-input')[0].placeholder = 'Search street, place or zip code'
        }") %>%
  addLegend(opacity = 0.6,
            values = sexassaults_district$rate_last12, 
            pal = sexassaultpal1,
            position = "bottomleft", 
            title = paste(sep="","<popuptitle>Sexual Assault Rate<br><popupchatter>Sexual Assaults/100K people<br>Citywide: ",sexassaults_city$rate_last12),
            group = "Rate",
            className = "info legend Rate") %>%
  addLegend(opacity = 0.6,
            values = sexassaults_district$last12mos, 
            pal = sexassaultpal2,
            position = "bottomleft", 
            title = paste(sep="","<popuptitle>Sexual Assaults<br><popupchatter>Total sexual assaults<br>Citywide: ",sexassaults_city$last12mos),
            group = "Number",
            className = "info legend Number") %>%
  addLayersControl(
    baseGroups = c("Rate","Number"),
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE),
    position = 'bottomright') %>% hideGroup(c("Number")) %>%
   htmlwidgets::onRender("
      function(el, x) {
         var updateLegend = function () {
            var selectedGroup = document.querySelectorAll('input:checked')[0].nextSibling.innerText.substr(1);

            document.querySelectorAll('.legend').forEach(a => a.hidden=true);
            document.querySelectorAll('.legend').forEach(l => {
               if (l.classList.contains(selectedGroup)) l.hidden=false;
            });
         };
         updateLegend();
         this.on('baselayerchange', el => updateLegend());
      }"
   )
losangeles_sexassault_map
```
